characters.name: Jason
characters.visualDescription: A young man with a mop of curly brown hair, a strong jawline, and bright blue eyes.

characters.name: Dog
characters.visualDescription: A small, white terrier with a black spot on its back.

scenes.camera: Wide shot of Berlin, showing the hustle and bustle of the city.
scenes.plot: Jason is seen running through the streets of Berlin, desperately searching for something.

scenes.camera: Close up of Jason's face, looking around frantically.
scenes.plot: Jason is at the train station, trying to buy a ticket to escape Berlin.

scenes.camera: The camera follows the train as it moves through the countryside.
scenes.plot: Jason is on the train, looking out the window, thinking about his true love.

scenes.camera: Wide shot of the small town, showing the quaintness of the place.
scenes.plot: Jason arrives at his destination, but is disappointed to find that his true love is not there.

scenes.camera: Close up of the dog, showing its cute face.
scenes.plot: Jason is walking through the town, when he finds a small, white terrier with a black spot on its back. The dog follows him, and they become fast friends.

scenes.camera: Wide shot of Jason and the dog walking together, with the sun setting in the background.
scenes.plot: Jason and the dog are walking together, content with each other's company. The camera pans out, showing the two of them walking off into the sunset.
